Text: Thank you very much for your wide and varied stock of films noirs. Have you available to your collection a film from the 50s called "The Trap" or "The Baited Trap"? It stars Richard Widmark in one of the few roles he played as a good guy. It had Lee J Cobb as the main bad guy. I haven't seen this flick for at least fifteen years and I didn't get to see the whole film even then.
